verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about <S%G1722>when<s%> He <S%G2064>went<s%> into the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G758>leaders<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> on [the] <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> to <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> that they were <S%G3906>watching<s%> Him <S%G3906>closely.<s%>
And <S%G2400>there,<s%> in <S%G1715>front<s%> of Him was a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5203>suffering<s%> from <S%G5203>dropsy.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>spoke<s%> to the <S%G3544>lawyers<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G2323>heal<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> not?"
But they <S%G2270>kept<s%> <S%G2270>silent.<s%> And He <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G1949>hold<s%> of him, and <S%G2390>healed<s%> him, and <S%G630>sent<s%> him <S%G630>away.<s%>

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Which<s%> one of you shall have a <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G1016>ox<s%> <S%G4098>fall<s%> into a <S%G5421>well,<s%> and will not <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G385>pull<s%> him out on a <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>?"
And they <S%G2480>could<s%> <S%G470>make<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G470>reply<s%> to <S%G3778>this.<s%>

And He [began] <S%G3004>speaking<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%> to the <S%G2564>invited<s%> <S%G2564>guests<s%> when He <S%G1907>noticed<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they had been <S%G1586>picking<s%> out the <S%G4411>places<s%> of <S%G4411>honor<s%> [at the table;] <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them,

<S%G3752>"When<s%> you are <S%G2564>invited<s%> by <S%G5100>someone<s%> to a <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1062>feast,<s%> do not <S%G2625>take<s%> the <S%G4411>place<s%> of <S%G4411>honor,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> someone <S%G1784>more<s%> <S%G1784>distinguished<s%> than you may have <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G2564>invited<s%> by him,

and he who <S%G2564>invited<s%> you <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G846><s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1325>'Give<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man,<s%>' and <S%G5119>then<s%> in <S%G152>disgrace<s%> you <S%G757>proceed<s%> to <S%G2722>occupy<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>

"But <S%G3752>when<s%> you are <S%G2564>invited,<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> and <S%G377>recline<s%> at the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G3752>when<s%> the one who has <S%G2564>invited<s%> you <S%G2064>comes,<s%> he may <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G5384>'Friend,<s%> <S%G4320>move<s%> up <S%G511>higher<s%>'; <S%G5119>then<s%> you will have <S%G1391>honor<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> who are at the <S%G4873>table<s%> with you.
"For <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G5312>exalts<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be <S%G5013>humbled,<s%> and he who <S%G5013>humbles<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be <S%G5312>exalted.<s%>"

And He <S%G2532>also<s%> went on to <S%G3004>say<s%> to the one who had <S%G2564>invited<s%> Him, <S%G3752>"When<s%> you <S%G4160>give<s%> a <S%G712>luncheon<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G1173>dinner,<s%> do not <S%G5455>invite<s%> your <S%G5384>friends<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> your <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> your <S%G4773>relatives<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G1069>neighbors,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> they <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G479>invite<s%> you in <S%G479>return,<s%> and <S%G468>repayment<s%> <S%G1096>come<s%> to you.
"But <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G4160>give<s%> a <S%G1403>reception,<s%> <S%G2564>invite<s%> [the] <S%G4434>poor,<s%> [the] <S%G376>crippled,<s%> [the] <S%G5560>lame,<s%> [the] <S%G5185>blind,<s%>

and you will be <S%G3107>blessed,<s%> <S%G3754>since<s%> they do not <S%G2192>have<s%> [the means] to <S%G467>repay<s%> you; for you will be <S%G467>repaid<s%> at the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G1342>righteous.<s%> "

And when <S%G5100>one<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G4873>reclining<s%> [at the table] with Him <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> is <S%G3748>everyone<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> shall <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"
But He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> was <S%G4160>giving<s%> a <S%G3173>big<s%> <S%G1173>dinner,<s%> and he <S%G2564>invited<s%> <S%G4183>many;<s%>

and at the <S%G1173>dinner<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> his <S%G1401>slave<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who had been <S%G2564>invited,<s%> <S%G2064>'Come;<s%> for everything is <S%G2092>ready<s%> <S%G2235>now.<s%>'

"But they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G575>alike<s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3868>make<s%> <S%G3868>excuses.<s%> The <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4413>one<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, 'I have <S%G59>bought<s%> a <S%G68>piece<s%> of <S%G68>land<s%> and I <S%G318>need<s%> to <S%G1831>go<s%> out and <S%G3708>look<s%> at it; <S%G2065>please<s%> <S%G2192>consider<s%> me <S%G3868>excused.<s%>'

"And <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2087>one<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'I have <S%G59>bought<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2201>yoke<s%> of <S%G1016>oxen,<s%> and I am <S%G4198>going<s%> to <S%G1381>try<s%> them out; <S%G2065>please<s%> <S%G2192>consider<s%> me <S%G3868>excused.<s%>'

"And <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2087>one<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'I have <S%G1060>married<s%> a <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and for that <S%G1223>reason<s%> I <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>'

"And the <S%G1401>slave<s%> <S%G3854>came<s%> [back] and <S%G518>reported<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> to his <S%G2962>master.<s%> <S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G3617>head<s%> of the <S%G3617>household<s%> became <S%G3710>angry<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to his <S%G1401>slave,<s%> <S%G1831>'Go<s%> out at <S%G5030>once<s%> into the <S%G4116>streets<s%> and <S%G4505>lanes<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> and <S%G1521>bring<s%> in <S%G5602>here<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%> and <S%G376>crippled<s%> and <S%G5185>blind<s%> and <S%G5560>lame.<s%>'

"And the <S%G1401>slave<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2962>'Master,<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G2004>commanded<s%> has <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G1096>done,<s%> and <S%G2089>still<s%> there is <S%G5117>room.<s%>'

"And the <S%G2962>master<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G1401>slave,<s%> <S%G1831>'Go<s%> out into the <S%G3598>highways<s%> and along the <S%G5418>hedges,<s%> and <S%G315>compel<s%> [them] to <S%G1525>come<s%> in, that my <S%G3624>house<s%> may be <S%G1072>filled.<s%>
'For I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> who were <S%G2564>invited<s%> shall <S%G1089>taste<s%> of my <S%G1173>dinner.<s%>' "
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> were <S%G4848>going<s%> <S%G4848>along<s%> with Him; and He <S%G4762>turned<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them,

<S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> to Me, and does not <S%G3404>hate<s%> his own <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother<s%> and <S%G1135>wife<s%> and <S%G5043>children<s%> and <S%G80>brothers<s%> and <S%G79>sisters,<s%> <S%G2089>yes,<s%> and <S%G2532>even<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5590>life,<s%> he <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> be My <S%G3101>disciple.<s%>
<S%G3748>"Whoever<s%> does not <S%G941>carry<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4716>cross<s%> and <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> Me <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> be My <S%G3101>disciple.<s%>

"For <S%G5101>which<s%> one of you, when he <S%G2309>wants<s%> to <S%G3618>build<s%> a <S%G4444>tower,<s%> does not <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> and <S%G5585>calculate<s%> the <S%G1160>cost,<s%> to see <S%G1487>if<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> enough to <S%G535>complete<s%> it?

<S%G2443>"Otherwise,<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4218>when<s%> he has <S%G5087>laid<s%> a <S%G2310>foundation,<s%> and is not <S%G2480>able<s%> to <S%G1615>finish,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> who <S%G2334>observe<s%> it <S%G757>begin<s%> to <S%G1702>ridicule<s%> him,
<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>'This<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3618>build<s%> and was not <S%G2480>able<s%> to <S%G1615>finish.<s%>'

<S%G2228>"Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G935>king,<s%> when he <S%G4198>sets<s%> out to <S%G4820>meet<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> in <S%G4171>battle,<s%> will not <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> and <S%G1011>take<s%> <S%G1011>counsel<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> he is <S%G1415>strong<s%> <S%G1415>enough<s%> with <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G5505>thousand<s%> [men] to <S%G5221>encounter<s%> the one <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> him with <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G5505>thousand<s%>?

<S%G1161>"Or<s%> <S%G7507>else,<s%> while the <S%G846>other<s%> is <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G4206>far<s%> <S%G4206>away,<s%> he <S%G649>sends<s%> a <S%G4242>delegation<s%> and <S%G2065>asks<s%> <S%G4314>terms<s%> of <S%G1515>peace.<s%>

<S%G3779>"So<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956>one<s%> of you <S%G1410>can<s%> be My <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> does not <S%G657>give<s%> up <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5225>possessions.<s%>

<S%G3767>"Therefore,<s%> <S%G217>salt<s%> is <S%G2570>good;<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G217>salt<s%> has <S%G3471>become<s%> <S%G3471>tasteless,<s%> with <S%G5101>what<s%> will it be <S%G741>seasoned<s%>?

"It is <S%G3777>useless<s%> <S%G2111><s%> <S%G3777>either<s%> for the <S%G1093>soil<s%> <S%G3777>or<s%> for the <S%G2874>manure<s%> <S%G2874>pile;<s%> it is <S%G906>thrown<s%> out. He who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear.<s%>"
